note.p: Death: At his country house in Turnham Green, Middlesex (13 April 1815)
Burial: Bunhill Fields burial ground, London

Career: Apprenticed to a surgeon; entered St Thomas's Hospital (1773) and was Demonstrator of Anatomy under Joseph Else (FRS 1778); studied ophthalmic surgery; one of the founders of the Society for the Relief of the Widow and Orphans of Medical Men (1788); practised at New Bridge Street, London
